game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious clue leads you to search for a long-lost artifact in the heart of an abandoned ruin. Uncover its secrets and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical amulet

task.description: Make your way through the dense forest and find the entrance to the ancient ruins.
Explore the ruin's depths and uncover the hidden artifact.
